original_title: When Georgia Howled: Sherman on the March
overview: Georgia Public Broadcasting and the Atlanta History Center have partnered to produce the gripping new documentary recounting the Atlanta Campaign led by William Tecumseh Sherman which ravaged Georgia in the fight to defeat the Confederacy.
tagline: FOR 37 WEEKS IN 1864, GENERAL WILLIAM T. SHERMAN MADE GEORGIA HIS BATTLEGROUND.
title: When Georgia Howled: Sherman on the March
